body:
>> This is very bright and shiny.
>
> I can't tell if this is good or bad.

Jokingly: neither can I.

More seriously: I don't think it is bad. It definitely *looks* like Photon, which was the goal. It is certainly a change. The biggest thing I noticed is that the "you're on stage" warning is a very loud, bright yellow. I don't think that is a big problem though, since most users won't be on staging environments 🙂. The rest of the colors on the site actually work pretty nicely.
